channel.title: Softlayer_software_component_controlpanel_microsoft_webplatform on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_software_component_controlpanel_microsoft_webplatform on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_ControlPanel_Microsoft_WebPlatform
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_ControlPanel_Microsoft_WebPlatform Datatype Description This object specifies a specific Software Component: A WebPlatform instance. WebPlatform installations have a specific xml config with usernames and passwords. Defaults are initiated by this object. seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Component Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_ControlPanel_Microsoft_WebPlatform
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_ControlPanel_Microsoft_WebPlatform Datatype Description This object specifies a specific Software Component: A WebPlatform instance. WebPlatform installations have a specific xml config with usernames and passwords. Defaults are initiated by this object. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license.
